definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (my father is Jesse; Lag:BN 75 thinks fr. [[אֲבֶן]] (= [[בֶּן]] + [[ישׁי]] cf. LXX )Abessa[i] 1Sa 26:6)—´[[א]] 1Sa 26:6, 1Sa 26:6 + 17 t. 1 & 2 S = [[אַבְשַׁי]] 2Sa 10:10 + 5 t. 1 Ch.—grandson of Jesse; son of Zeruiah & brother of Joab 1Sa 26:6, 1Sa 26:6, 1Sa 26:7, 1Sa 26:8, 1Sa 26:9, 2Sa 2:18, 2Sa 2:24 + 2Sa 20:6 (where rd. [[יואב]] SyrVer Th We Dr) + 12 t. 2 S + 2Sa 20:7 (where insert [[אבישׁי]] LXX We Dr) + 5 t. 1 Ch.
